item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 1, 2025 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI O3-Mini (736 points | 679 comments)
2. Bypass DeepSeek censorship by speaking in hex (503 points | 266 comments)
3. Show HN: Perforator – cluster-wide profiling tool for large data centers (15 points | 6 comments)
4. Earthstar – A database for private, distributed, offline-first applications (154 points | 21 comments)
5. Hoppscotch: Open source alternative to Postman / Insomnia (73 points | 42 comments)
6. In Zig, what's a writer? (35 points | 11 comments)
7. Blogging on Paper (5 points | 3 comments)
8. Shades of Blunders (13 points | 2 comments)
9. Elite on the 6502: The original 6502 assembly source, heavily commented (161 points | 30 comments)
10. Auto-Differentiating Any LLM Workflow: A Farewell to Manual Prompting (32 points | 6 comments)
11. Sparrow, a modern C++ implementation of the Apache Arrow columnar format (72 points | 13 comments)
12. Why Tracebit is written in C# (103 points | 104 comments)
13. List of 200 UK companies that moved to 4-day working week (25 points | 8 comments)
14. FBI, Dutch police disrupt 'Manipulaters' phishing gang (133 points | 45 comments)
15. The Tensor Cookbook (2024) (141 points | 19 comments)
16. The Severance writer and cast on corporate cults, sci-fi, and more (21 points | 6 comments)
17. Scientists find links between Alzheimer's, herpes, and head trauma (121 points | 39 comments)
18. AI and two hundred dollar tasks (61 points | 52 comments)
19. Show HN: Uscope, a new Linux debugger written from scratch (215 points | 116 comments)
20. Zusie – My Relay Computer (117 points | 30 comments)
21. Notes on OpenAI o3-mini (138 points | 54 comments)
22. Falsehoods programmers believe about null pointers (76 points | 64 comments)
23. Hell is overconfident developers writing encryption code (128 points | 140 comments)
24. Fixing E.T. The Extra-Terrestrial for the Atari 2600 (2013) (116 points | 38 comments)
25. Living with Nausea: My Story in Six Charts (134 points | 64 comments)
26. Show HN: Simple to build MCP servers that easily connect with custom LLM calls (36 points | 16 comments)
27. Better Know a Ruby Thing: Singleton Classes (108 points | 19 comments)
28. FurtherAI (YC W24) Is Hiring engineers and researchers to build Vertical AI agents ( | hide)
29. Show HN: Lua-libuv – A Lua with libuv experiments (36 points | 1 comment)
30. Images reveal exocomets around nearby stars (91 points | 15 comments)
